title: My Client will not start up
body: When I press my LOL icon, It flashes the League Of Legends Logo and then nothing happens. I've tried everything. reinstalling it, Look thru other discussion on how to fix it and follow it step by step, Nothing seems to work. Please help me.

replies.body:
If it isn't either of the links morgageddon gave you, it's most likely your antivirus flagging LoL as a virus, and therefore preventing it from running. Avast! has done this multiple times in the past, and the way to fix it is to add LoL to your antivirus whitelist/exceptions.

Edit: 
It'll look something like this 
http://imgur.com/Pmi3KLW
Turn off the firewall. still hasn't work

> [{quoted}](name=Kaiju Killer,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dJnrGz2B,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-09T00:36:39.986+0000)
>
> Turn off the firewall. still hasn't work

Greetings Kaiju Killer

The specific error you're describing often have to do with missing privileges, so this isn't just your firewall but also your anti virus.

Once that is done, could you please navigate to your lol folder and find the file called "lol.launcher.admin.exe" and open League using that.

If you can get it working through by doing this, you'll need to whitelist league in your antivirus for good measure.

If you've recently updated to windows 10 or formatted your computer this is a pretty common error.

Heyo,

Have you tried all the steps here in these two guides?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3

If so, can you say you tried those and make a support ticket here?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Thanks!
